website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price per sheet for households that have multiple pets and need multiple rolls.
pros: Handles all kinds of lint and fur without leaving a residue behind on fabrics and surfaces
You can use refill rolls on the handles to save some money over the long run
After use, it's easy to peel off the used sheets to expose a new one
cons: Roll doesn't stay on the handle when placed under stress

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best for pet hair and lint!
customer_reviews.text: These are so sticky.....much better than 3M.....very effective at removing stubborn cat hair and other fuzzy bits. My go to from now on! Keep one at the office and one at home. Comes with 2 refills. Quality product that does what it says it will....very refreshing to spend money on something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: lovefromthe201

customer_reviews.title: Great product with one minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: This company asked for an honest review so here it is: A good value and removes hair and lint very well. Love the way it peels down diagonally as it’s much easier to access the new sheet than peeling the traditional straight vertical line. What I don’t love: You have to push the roller back onto the handle while rolling off your clothing or it comes off completely. Fix this design flaw and it’s a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Good amount of stick.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the cat fur off my clothes immediately. Easy to use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very useful on everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love pets everywhere... And unfortunalety my favorite clothing color is black. This works great. I keep one in the car, my purse, my office, my closet..
customer_reviews.author: Huseyin E.

customer_reviews.title: stickyyyyyyyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: way better then a regular lint roller, stays sticky for a long time too , picked up a lot for me!
customer_reviews.author: Shae Regan

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I wear a lot of black and navy .....and the roller picks up all the lint I come in contact with. I keep one in the car for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: BDJ

customer_reviews.title: Gets all the fuzzies and cat hair off
customer_reviews.text: Every time I go stay at my brother's house I end up with cat hair on everything. They have three cats and even when they vacuum it doesn't really help the prevention of cat hair getting on all of my clothing - especially my black wool peacoat. I have tried regular lint rollers and even using 6 of those sticky rolls in a row doesn't completely clear my coat. These, however, do the job quickly and efficiently. I am very pleased to finally have a lin roller that truly does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mel

customer_reviews.title: It Really is Sticky!
customer_reviews.text: When I was about to review this product, I thought "What's the big deal? It's a lint roller!" Really, what can one say about it? Well, a few days ago, I used up my other lint roller, and finally used one of these. Now, please understand, I do not have pets, but I do a lot of sewing and knitting. I end up with threads and fibers everywhere. It was amazing how much better this roller worked! Truly, I was shocked to discover there really is a difference! I don't know how it will work on pet hair, but for thread, etc., it was so easy to just whisk it away. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: It works better than most. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and wear a lot of black. This works every morning. Easy sheet peel with solid stickiness on each sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Anon custy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good roller
customer_reviews.text: So sick of the ones you pick up at your local store that don't work, I had to find one that worked better. Well after reading most of the reviews I went with this one. This product works as advertised, JUST BUY THEM and you will be happy like me lol. We have 3 Siamese cats that shed a lot and our clothes and furniture get heavily covered. We use it on our clothes before leaving the house and even one sheet takes it all off, some other brands we needed to use multiple sheets to clear 1 shirt. These we could use one sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fur-ific!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I was skeptical about the whole roller being better / made for pet hair etc...but I will admit when I am wrong. This truly does pick up the dog hair. My two boys (my lab more than my BT) have hair everywhere...these truly do work! The only issue I have is the stability of the roller (it sometimes will pop off), but maybe I just haven't mastered the right technique yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Marks

customer_reviews.title: Roll Does Not Stay On the Roller :(
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are adequately sticky and I like the way they peel off the roll. However, the roll won't stay on the roller when attempting to use which makes using it super annoying. The roll slips off the end of the roller so you basically just have to drag the roll across your clothing in order to use it. This lint brush is not worth the money. I have extra rolls because I ordered the one with multiple rolls assuming that you couldn't mess up a lint roller. I was definitely wrong. I would not recommend this product and I certainly will not be purchasing more rolls for this poorly designed handle/ roller.
customer_reviews.author: J&J Andreason

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, they work well and they peel off on an angle which is so much better. I use them for everything because I hate lint and dust. I use them on clothes, upholstery, lampshades, they’re awesome!
customer_reviews.author: City Reader

customer_reviews.title: Lint Roller falls off Handle
customer_reviews.text: Lint roller is not sticky as described. Worst is the Iint roller falls off of handle little by little, by each roll.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: This thing is practically usless with a long haired cat in the house
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking I'd get a LOT of use out of them and help keep my clothing et al at least a little bit more hair free. But - I have an 18 lb Maine Coon Mix cat and I end up using almost one sheet for one or two rolls across my clothing before it doesn;t have enough sticky left to be effective any longer. THAT's the part that makes it a poor value for my $$$
customer_reviews.author: Thedreamspinner

customer_reviews.title: Pets are the hairy
customer_reviews.text: This works for those cats that never leave your black clothes alone. I went with extra sticky because that's what I need to go outside with these clothes. They come with changeable rollers, but they tend to come loose if you roll on your fabric aggressively. Don't leave home without one.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Picks up very well & head stays on
customer_reviews.text: The last lint rollers I purchased were ok, but, the sticky head kept falling off (not this brand). So far these are holding together when I use them. We have a memory foam pad for our granddaughter to play on & I lint roller it at least 3 times a day. I appreciate that I don't have to keep putting the head back on with every swipe. Now whenever I'm in baby jail with her she tries to use the lint roller too! For 14 months she's getting pretty good at it! I recommend these rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dan

customer_reviews.title: Almost but, they blew it.
customer_reviews.text: NO ONE seems to make a good lint roller :(( This had promise - picked up pet hair well (not so much on crumbs). The diagonal sheets peel off easily BUT only after you search with your thumbnail to find the corner to pull. Even with that, I was going to tolerate due to price until.....When you put the outside wrapper back on (to cover the sticky when not in use), the cover totally sticks! I mean, totally - actually tore when I tried to get it back off. How dumb is that? Returning.
customer_reviews.author: emc

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are very sticky which is the only plus. These rollers fall apart every time you get a decent rhythm going hence I need to stop every 1-2 pass throughs to push down the sheets onto the base of the roller. Additionally it is hard to see where to tear a sheet off. Once I get the corner (they are diagonal) right they do rip off quickly but it’s a pain in the a** getting to that corner. The sheets are very sticky which makes you think they will work well but the shotty quality of the roller itself undermines the efforts of the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Boston

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Meh was looking for the 3M ones that are THICK sheets. These are not, just extra glue. They maybe have half a leg worth of extra sticky to them, sticks to you and everything else but not great at grabbing the lint. Not so sturdy feeling handle. If you dont own a cat or a dog these are worth a basic office roller.
customer_reviews.author: Haylie Miller

customer_reviews.title: So sticky the cover sticks to the roller sheets
customer_reviews.text: Well the lint rollers pull off pretty much all of the dog hair but then I don't know how to store the rollers as nothing I try can cover the roller without getting torn apart when I'm ready to remove it for the next use. The original cover stuck to the roller after 1 use. I think the manufacturer needs to do a little research to perfect the cover because a lint roller without a cover is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: looking for change

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who has struggled to remove the used sheets from a roller, you know what a pain that can be! These start to peel away from an angled corner, super easy to get to a clean piece. Works very well. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: What cat hair?
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. There are two cat beds, but they are rarely used by these brats. Instead, all the furniture is fair game and I get lots of black hair showing up on everything. This pet hair remover gets all that hair up and away quickly and easily. It even took on a off-white dining table chair that my black cat was using as his bed. Total black across the chair that came off with a few swipes. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fraggie

customer_reviews.title: let down!
customer_reviews.text: i really hoped i had finally found the perfect roller, but this was a huge let down. the sticky sheets ARE super sticky as stated, however still not strong enough to remove pet hair (i have to use at least 3 sheets per pant leg). this does not work AT ALL on my workout pants. im better off taking the hair out with my hand. the handles are SUPER CHEAP! the roller comes off every time i use it.
customer_reviews.author: glendy

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky!
customer_reviews.text: Super sticky! Works great for removing dog hair. My dog sheds terribly and she has short tiny hairs that I seem to find everywhere (bed, couch, clothes) and I can run one of these bad boys over it and it picks up almost every little hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but entire area is not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Product was sticky enough for what we use it for. However, as you can see in the photos, there is a thick ribbon of area that is not sticky on each piece peeled off. For this reason we'll not purchase any more.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this because let's face it, this is the internet, 99% of product descriptions are 100% lies. But the reviews looked promising, and I needed new rollers because my cat sheds so much I don't understand how she has any fur left at all. So I got these and oh man, they are amazing. I wish I tried them about 500 sheets of the crappy ones ago. I need to use far less sheets because they are actually as sticky as advertised. I'm only getting these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great removal,  but one little issue....
customer_reviews.text: They are great at removing cat and dog hair. The only issue I have is that the roller itself has no stability. It's very wobbly, and does not allow for a smooth up and down motion for hair removal. It constantly wiggles out a bit from where the roll clicks to the handle, which is a bit annoying. If they could fix this issue.. then I'd give it 5 stars instead of 4.
customer_reviews.author: DEANNA JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to peel off and very effective
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pet hair remover that was easy to peel off each time. This one hits the mark! The diagonal cuts make it easy to peel and the surface is quite sticky which removes all kinds of pet hair. We keep a couple handy throughout the house to make sure our rabbit hair doesn't stick to our clothes and other surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Venkatesh Padmanabhan

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! not flimsy and really sticky! Perfect for pet owners! Wayy way better than other brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: eltonyc

customer_reviews.title: effective but clumsy
customer_reviews.text: Very effective at removing dog hairs/sweater fuzz. Sheets have a tapered edge and you always know where the end of the sheet is! The tape roll doesn’t stay on the handle very well, I find myself reattaching the cylinder multiple times per use. It does the job, but will try to find a product that doesn’t slide apart as easily in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ermagerdberks

customer_reviews.title: Received Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I use this roller to remove dog hair from my sheets every morning. I was rolling a bit hard and broke the handle. Not only did the seller send me a replacement handle quickly but also new rolls and a new heavy duty roller as well. Very happy with their exceptional customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something to keep the pet hair under control and off my clothes. There is just one little hitch. I have to put the wand away dirty. Nothing that came with it goes off and on when not in use. It is so sticky that even the cover that came with it sticks. But I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, at best..
customer_reviews.text: I like these rollers. They glide nicely and they’re super sticky. I marked them down because they’re shaped funny, they’re small, and you need to use a couple if you’ve got animals. If it wasn’t for the extreme stickiness I’d have given it one star.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky. Picks up cat hair on every fabric surface
customer_reviews.text: I have a long haired cat who likes to groom herself all the time so I like how sticky this product is compared to a prior product I used. The handle is comfortable in my hand and it is easy to use for large surfaces like my bed spread and couch. You couldn't go wrong, purchasing Metkix Lint Rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: IT ACTUALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This actually worked great on pulling the cat and dog hair off my shirts. The only down side is the handle. I have tried a lot of other rollers so luckily i had a different handle to use it with. This by far has out performed all of the other rollers i have tried. It is a little small and fills up fast but thats because it is actually working. Usually takes 2 strips to do a shirt (1 for the front and 1 for the back)
customer_reviews.author: daryl magill

customer_reviews.title: Cheapy Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I used these for short haired dog hair on bedding. Sticky paper worked well but, the rollers are very cheaply made and the roll of sticky paper rolls right off the handle. Very frustrating. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product as soon as I go it. It picked up my cats hair fairly easy. I've tried plenty of lint rollers this one is definitely the best one by far. I didn't give it the full 5 stars and that's only because I haven't put the roller through really tough jobs, will update as I continue to use. So far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Adilene Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I have two cats who shed like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have two cats who shed like crazy and I wear black to work, so this has been a life saver in terms of picking up every single hair. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Pari

customer_reviews.title: Fine for quick use
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for quick use, would like for it to be a tiny bit easier to peel off the pieces I don't need and just a little bit more sticky to get all the fuzz and dog furs off my clothing. Overall a good product though. I know you can't get every single fiber off.
customer_reviews.author: Suzears

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good value
customer_reviews.text: These are nice.. extra sticky but that initial sheet removal is a pain ! Took way too long to rip the first sheet off lol. Despite this, I think it's better than scotch guards version of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones at IKEA.  Prefer 3M or Costco
customer_reviews.text: I prefer 3M or the ones I get at Costco. However these also do the trick. I'm only saying my preference if there was a choice. If not, these get the job done. Equivalent to the ones from Ikea
customer_reviews.author: RyRy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to roll and sheets are easy to take off between uses
customer_reviews.text: Best lint rollers on the market, take my word for it! The sheets are soooooo easy to take off when you have used all of the sticky part which is really important because I’ve used other brands where I end up wasting a sheet or two just trying to get one off. The value for your money is worth it since it comes with extra inserts and these roll so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth carol spencer

customer_reviews.title: Says it’s extra sticky...It’s Not.
customer_reviews.text: Says it is extra sticky but we have found that it is similar to other basic products out there. One thing that is nice about it is you can peel the tape easily. It works and not worth sending back, but you will use more pieces of tape to clean up pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and his girlfriend. They have a husky and he sheds like no tomorrow. My sons gf was using it for the first time and literally stopped with her mouth hanging open saying this is FANTASTIC!! She is thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Gongliewski

customer_reviews.title: I’m blown away
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are the best lint removers I’ve used. I own two Siberian huskies and two long haired cats-both shed their hair like crazy. I’ve tried most of the lint removers on the market. These far exceed the others. These are very sticky, and I only needed to use one sheet to remove all the hair from both of my pant legs. Typically it takes three or four sheets to remove all the hair on my legs. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimkimkim123

customer_reviews.title: Metkix -  Great Lint Rollers
customer_reviews.text: This product works GREAT, use it every morning to get the cat hair off my quilt, AND... you don’t have to fight to get the spent paper off - it’s easy to just get it off for your next fresh sheet. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eva Ross

customer_reviews.title: Super Sticky! Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller! The used papers come off quickly and easily by grabbing the tip of the angle they are rolled on. They're really nice and sticky and work well on dog hair. But I have to say the ease of removal is the reason I'll be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Francis T.

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: These lint / fur removers are excellent. The only issue I had was removing the cover - was used to one perforation line all of the way down. You have to start it at bottom and lift up. Sometimes the cover does not stay in one piece. Overall, works very well.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice how you can peel away a sheet for the role. Much better than scotch bright or any others I have used. I find the rules to be very sticky and take away a lot of the hair and just one sheet. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Cavone

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i have convertable jag and i cover it a lot but when you take the cover off the top gets a lot of fluff on it these work much better than i thought thank you for solving my problem
customer_reviews.author: Eric T 1

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Did not remove hair well at all and the handle is REALLY wonky. Also purchased the green handled roller by another manufacturer, which I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: SmittyE

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular lint rollers
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. They pick up pet hair way better than regular lint rollers. The sheets are small though so you're constantly tearing them off to use a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the granddog. She, however comes with lots of hair and it can redefine the space during her visit. Brushing helps, but this roller is wonderful and the piece missing from doing the best job possibly. I love the ways the layers peel off, it is sticky and I love it
customer_reviews.author: MSE-H

customer_reviews.title: Great and sticky but roll can pop off
customer_reviews.text: LIKE: really sticky and easy to peel diagonally. ONLY DISLIKE: the roll will pop off the handle sometimes. Have similar problems with other rollers too. Wish it had a better locking system or something at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was never a fan of the paper rollers. but this by far is the best kind. it picks up every little thing. im never going back to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: boshra khorasani

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this lint roller a few times; school uniforms really attract lint! They work really well. They’re very sticky and pull up all sorts of lint and dog hair. I love them and will be purchasing them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shar-Pei Mom

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but not exceptional in any way TBH
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and need something to remove lots of hair. This is better than regular lint rollers *i guess* really not much better than the namebrand ones you can buy at Walmart to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Rollers do not stay on the handle. Stickiness just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I saw other reviews that said the rollers don’t stay on the handle, so it is my own fault. They really don’t stay on so it takes longer and it is frustrating to roll the lint off any size garment. The price was right, but with the handle issues and because the stickiness is just ok,I wouldn’t recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CLM

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great product. However the holder comes away from the roller every time it is used. It is a struggle every time I use it and a very poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It works and is not wasteful.
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Pyrenees provides ample dog hair to fully test any lint roller and I can honestly Ireport that yours is the best that I have used. Also, sticky papers peel off easily which is important to me because I have had to throw other brands away before they were empty because they had 'fused' together and I could not remove a used sheet to get to a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Wible

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and you can’t beat the price with subscribe and save...trust me, I always look for that, along with ratings. These work just as well as any brand. They are sturdy and sticky. I definitely recommend doing a subscribe and save every however many months b/c of the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Extra sticky pet hair removal
customer_reviews.text: Having these extra sticky pet rollers is the only way I can live in a house with 2 cats!! I keep one in the house and one in my car.
customer_reviews.author: NannyBear

customer_reviews.title: not what i was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: had to use many sheets to get one couch cover cleaned off....it just didn't absorb or have much stick to it after each swipe
customer_reviews.author: JMicsky

customer_reviews.title: Misleading image
customer_reviews.text: The rollers are fine, I only got half of what was shown in the image. One roller one refill.
customer_reviews.author: Wyo Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best roller I’ve ever purchased! My only complaint is that the sticky pad slides down the holder as you roll it but that’s a minor annoyance... positive is the paper is so easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat owners
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these... We have 2 cats, Myster n Myssy, who are 2 shedding Tabby's and my wife says these help here battle the hair problem..!
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Typical hair/lint removal sheets, no detrations.
customer_reviews.text: I have three Persians I keep in full coat, so a hair/lint removal roller is essential. This is a solidly built and fully functional product. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: C. Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Falls off the handle when you roll it-but Sticky!
customer_reviews.text: These are super sticky but the roller will not stay on the handle falls off when you roll- pretty cheaply made. But sticky very very sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Most lint rollers are wrapped to tightly and it is difficult to get it started. Not this particular lint roller though. It pulls off easily, super sticky too! For the price I will definitely order again. TY
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Very Sticky (Great at removing hair)
customer_reviews.text: Myself, after blow drying my hair, and on the furniture, it is very good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth from Sarasota Fl.

customer_reviews.title: Surface is sticky, but it doesn't roll well.
customer_reviews.text: The surface is sticky, but it doesn't roll well. The whole thing falls off when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: moneymfd

customer_reviews.title: Quicker Lint Picker Upper
customer_reviews.text: The best lint roller I've ever purchased. My dogs shed like crazy and unfortunately my work wardrobe consists of mostly BLACK. Easy to travel with and will literally pick up every piece of lint including surfaces. I will be repurchasing in the near future but with the extra rolls that are sent with your initial purchase...itll be a while :-) .
customer_reviews.author: DANUTA JENNINGS

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat which means I have a lot of his fur in my apartment which means I need a very good lint roller and guess what: I found one!
customer_reviews.author: Olga M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Lint rollers are very sticky which they should be yet not bulky like some brands.
customer_reviews.author: donna bozek

customer_reviews.title: It works... Just bad design
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, delivered as advertised, works for the most part as advertised. I could’ve gotten just a bad batch. The roller itself seems just a shade too small for the sticky rolls .. The rolls won’t stay on the handles. I roll up and down a couple times and the roll just wants to come off the handle. It’s frustrating specially when you’re trying to Cover a large area like a car seat or something to get pet hair off.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s impossible to get outer cover off
customer_reviews.text: Did not like. Have not been able to get the outer cover off any roll. I’ve used many other brands of lint removers and never had problems. These are awful
customer_reviews.author: Celestineri downs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who sheds copiously and my regular lint roller didn’t work well. I use this on the furniture, bedding and anywhere my cat hangs out. I gave my cat treats when he lets me roll him directly. I use a lot of sheets but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Dieringer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a fur factory ... these things are the best I have ever had!
customer_reviews.author: anita stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clean off hair better than anything
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They work so well getting the hair off my clothes and easy to use. I have one in my car and at work
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These easily remove lint and dog hair from anything! I use them everyday before work and they last a good while
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. We have two dogs & they really work well. This is my second purchase. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: works great on clothes
customer_reviews.text: This was not very effective on furniture but perfect on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Really good value and I like that they peel off diagonally instead of the traditional way.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Pet owner cat mommy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good not worth the price but not too bad scotch brite does a better job and less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra sticky sheets and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra sticky sheets as they pick up a lot of pet hair and other things... I love how easy they peel off the roller :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not good.
customer_reviews.text: The product is sticky upon first use, however, after one or two rolls on your clothing, it pretty much loses the stickiness. It’s hard to pick up the remaining pet hair or lint if the product isn’t sticky. Also, since this lint roller comes with refills, you have to go slow or else the roller comes off. You pretty much need to stop midway through to readjust the roller back onto the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and easy to peel
customer_reviews.text: The stickiness is perfect and I really like how easy each sheet is to peel. Works really well to get cat hair off my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Sattar

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky!
customer_reviews.text: These are way more sticky than the ones you can buy at the store. It gets cat hair out of my wooliest coats.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Lint and cat fur free clothing
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and also have a pair of expensive jeans that seem to look for lint and cat hair. This is the first product that gets all of that unwanted stuff off these pants
customer_reviews.author: Montana Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty standard
customer_reviews.text: They work well. Nothing inherently bad or exceptional about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They don’t seem extra sticky, maybe just normal. It takes a good bit of rolling over one spot to get all of the pet hair. Not too bad though and it comes with a lot of sheets for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are terrific. They are the only kind that really get the lint off my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is good about them!
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are hard to remove, hard to use, the roll won't stay on the handle. It's a lousy value for the money! Scotch Brite rollers are far better!!
customer_reviews.author: KC Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs that shed all over the house. This works great to remove from clothes and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: NLV Mom

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product ,it works as advertised,takes off the dog hair from my clothes with little effort.I will definitely reorder this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Edelstein

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I.like it better than the ones I got at Costco. Each sheet is easy to take off the roller. Works greay.
customer_reviews.author: vesta

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these rollers. These lint rollers are super sticky to get all those tough to get pieces of lint ,So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: The dream of sultan

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as it was a great deal. Works good but the only issue is while you roll the handle up/down the pads roll off the handle. The sticky refills separate from the handle and this is quite frustrating. We fixed the issue by putting a sticky piece on the inside of the roller handle and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Does the job it is suppose to with multiple replacement rolls!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

product_meta.title: Metkix Lint Rollers for Pet Hair Remover,Extra Sticky -Upgraded Handles- Pet Lint Brush Fur Lint Remover,Cat Dog Hair Remover for Furniture and Clothes Total 240 Sheets
feature_bullets: EASY PEEL OFF: Thanks to Metkix Lint Rollers for pet hair extra sticky design and easily removable sheet, you will save time and energy in both cleaning your furniture, couch, clothes and replacing the sheet. Pet hair remover.

UPGRADED DURABLE HANDLES: We gave ear to your feedbacks and upgraded our handle in both number and quality, making it more effective than other lint brush pet hair remover. With two large lint roller, now you can use one at home while you can make use of the other portable lint roller at your office or during your trips.

EXTRA STICKY: Our pet hair lint remover for clothes will leave no lint, dust, cat hair, dog hair remover or any pet hair behind thanks to its improved extra sticky lint roller design. You will not have to go over the same spot again and again.

METKIX LINT ROLLER FOR PET HAIR IS YOUR HOME ASSISTANT: Our hair roller will serve as a perfect assistant in your home, car and office. Use it as either pick up any shards or dirts from spaces that a vacuum cleaner can never reach. It is extremely easy and effective for all surfaces; clothes, furniture, sofa, carpet, bed sheets, curtains, hardwood floors,etc.

VALUABLE PACK and LIFETIME WARRANTY: Our product includes 2 ergonomic grip handles and 6 Lint Roller Refill! Total 360 sheets in one package. Valuable Lint Roller pack provides great value. We promise you will not be disappointed. Your satisfaction is our priority, thus you will be provided a lifetime warranty in case you are not satisfied with our lint roller.
